Metadata.title: Ingetin - Get Paid Without the Awkwardness
Metadata.description: Helping freelancers and SMEs track orders and send professional payment reminders automatically.

Introduction.label: Introduction
Introduction.title: Get Paid Without the Awkwardness
Introduction.description: Automated invoice reminders for freelancers and SMEs to secure cash flow without the social friction.
Introduction.subtitle: Track your orders and let our system send polite, professional invoice reminders on auto-pilot. Focus on your craft, and stop chasing payments manually.

Problem.label: Problem
Problem.title: Sound Familiar?
Problem.description: Common pain points that kill productivity and stall business growth.
items: Losing track of unpaid orders in endless chat history.
The anxiety of asking clients for money (again).
Great sales on paper, but terrible cash flow in reality.

Solution.label: Solution
Solution.title: Streamline Your Billing in 3 Steps
Solution.description: A simple workflow to organize orders and automate your follow-ups.
Solution.step_1_desc: Quickly input client details and set the due date.
Solution.step_2_desc: See exactly how much revenue is pending at a glance.
Solution.step_3_desc: We send the polite nudges via email automatically. You just get the notification when the money arrives.

Features.title: Simple Features, Big Impact
Features.description: Explore our digital tracking and automated billing tools designed for simplicity.
Features.subtitle: We don't do complicated features. Ingetin is built to be intuitive so you can start using it immediately without a manual.

tracking.title: Digital Order Tracker
tracking.description: Ditch the messy notebooks. Client data and order history are stored neatly, securely, and searchable forever.

dashboard.title: Financial Dashboard
dashboard.description: Understand your numbers at a glance: monthly revenue, paid invoices, and what's due today.

email_reminder.title: Automated Email Reminders
email_reminder.description: The system sends emails on T-3, Due Date, and Overdue automatically. Polite, white-labeled with your brand, and professional.

Pricing.title: Small Investment, Smooth Cash Flow
Pricing.description: Flexible plans to fit your business stage. Transparent pricing, no hidden fees.
Pricing.subtitle: Securing just one on-time payment often covers the subscription cost.

Free.name: Starter
Free.description: Perfect for tidying up your messy order logs.

Pro.name: Pro Business
Pro.description: Perfect for those tired of chasing payments manually.
